Sentencas: Management of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) thermal gradients is vital to limit thermal expansion mismatch and thermal stress.
Titulo: Performance and Durability of Thin Film Thermocouple Array on a Porous Electrode

Sentencas: However, owing to harsh operation conditions of SOFCs and limited available space in stack configuration, the number of techniques available to obtain temperature distribution from the cell surface is limited.
Titulo: Performance and Durability of Thin Film Thermocouple Array on a Porous Electrode

Sentencas: The authors previously developed and studied a thermocouple array pattern to detect surface temperature distribution on an SOFC in open circuit conditions.
Titulo: Performance and Durability of Thin Film Thermocouple Array on a Porous Electrode

Sentencas: In this study, the performance in terms of mechanical durability and oxidation state of the thin film thermoelements of the thermocouple array on the porous SOFC cathode is investigated.
Titulo: Performance and Durability of Thin Film Thermocouple Array on a Porous Electrode

Sentencas: A thin-film multi-junction thermocouple array was sputter deposited using a magnetron sputter coater.
Titulo: Performance and Durability of Thin Film Thermocouple Array on a Porous Electrode

Sentencas: Scanning electron microscopy (SEM) and X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy (XPS) characterisation techniques were carried out to understand characteristics of the thin film before and after temperature (20 degrees C-800 degrees C) measurement.
Titulo: Performance and Durability of Thin Film Thermocouple Array on a Porous Electrode

Sentencas: Temperature readings from the sensor agreed well with the closely placed commercial thermocouple during heating segments.
Titulo: Performance and Durability of Thin Film Thermocouple Array on a Porous Electrode

Sentencas: However, a sensor failure occurred at around 350 degrees C during the cooling segment.
Titulo: Performance and Durability of Thin Film Thermocouple Array on a Porous Electrode

Sentencas: The SEM and XPS tests revealed cracks on the thin film thermoelements and oxidation to the film thickness direction.
Titulo: Performance and Durability of Thin Film Thermocouple Array on a Porous Electrode
